entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Dogfooding instructions for .NET 8 NativeAOT on macOS x64 via Rosetta #79253
  • Object Header or Sync Block in BotR: Threading - Synchronization: Managed #79248
  • .NET 7.0 GA Microbenchmarks Performance Study Report #79245
    8.0.0
  • Native AOT Diagnostics in .NET 8 #79241
    8.0.0
  • .NET runtime not found on Ubuntu #79237
  • Visual Studio debugger error when debugging an app collecting a dump against itself #79236
    Future
  • Blazor WASM locale currency differs from Browser WASM #79235
    8.0.0
  • What does the `License notice for Algorithm from Internet Draft document "UUIDs and GUIDs"` apply to? #79231
  • Consider deleting enum support for bool as an underlying type from all runtimes #79224
    Future
  • Is it static link only of mono aot on windows? #79214
  • Filehandle Blocks "Cut and Paste" allows "Copy and Paste" #79213
  • X509Chain build does not work for OCSP only certificate for .Net 3.1 on Linux #79212
  • Rename `RdXmlFile` to `_DirectivesFile` #79210
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\Runtime_45557\\Runtime_45557\\Runtime_45557.cmd #79207
  • Slow startup on Linux #79206
  • [NativeAOT] Investigate AOT size savings opportunities around async #79204
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_Uri #78975
  • Run unit tests as single file #43079
    Future
  • [Telemetry] Sockets telemetry like "bytes-sent" is using wrong CounterType #78568
  • [API Proposal]: ReadOnlySpan<T> CreateSpan<T>(RuntimeFieldHandle) #60948
    8.0.0
  • Base constructor not executed in Reflection.Emit #79142
  • [API Proposal]: ArgumentOutOfRangeException helper methods #69590
    8.0.0
  • Receive0ByteReturns_WhenPeerDisconnects - hang #32335
    Future
  • Need to ensure GivenThatICareAboutDotnetTestXunitScenarios are still relevant tests #2940
    Future
  • DirectoryVirtualListView.ApproximateTotal always returning zero for .NET Core #47169
    8.0.0
  • [Perf -14%] System.Reflection.Attributes.GetCustomAttributesClassHit (2) #44816
    8.0.0
  • MemberInfo.GetCustomAttribute() performance issue #44713
    8.0.0
  • Enable baseline validation for packages introduced in .NET 7 #78705
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_Matrix4x4 #78977
    8.0.0
  • An arbitrary array/span of references #38488
    8.0.0
  • Developers using Reflection should be able to use pointers and function pointers #44327
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Dedicated safe `SizeOf` API for layout fixed types #78871
  • Perf: Interlocked.Exchange should special-case nullptr values #69000
    8.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.WindowsServices.WindowsServiceHelpers.IsWindowsService() throws exception #78301
    Future
  • [mono] Assertion at mini-ppc.c:3801, condition `cfg->frame_reg == ppc_sp' not met #79205
    Future
  • HashSet<T>.Remove doesn't break enumerator #79227
  • System.Text.Json Polymorphic serialization with contract model cannot round-trip #79195
  • Conversion Between UTC and GMT Standard Time substracts 1 hour #79216
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 17 Regressions on 11/15/2022 9:22:46 AM #78836
  • Tests which depend on the host don't use a live built version #58109
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 15 Regressions on 11/15/2022 5:29:43 PM #78823
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 568 Regressions on 11/15/2022 10:02:59 PM #78824
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 5 Regressions on 11/17/2022 12:32:52 PM #78825
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 31 Regressions on 11/16/2022 6:51:59 PM #78835
  • [MONO][Interp]classloader tests failed with SEGV with interpreter #54560
    8.0.0
  • JsonElement comes as ValueKind string instead of object while using swagger UI #79211
  • Need more testing of multiple pending async Socket operations #16664
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests - build projects for net8.0 by default #79254
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Disable Runtime_31615 #79252
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix run.cmd syntax error #79250
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix Processor Count getting ignored due to typo in libs/build-native.proj #79249
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Update `dotnet-runtime-perf` to use `net8.0` #79247
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries, perf-pipeline
  • Throw when last BB is dead #79246
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [WIP] Cloning files on macOS when possible instead of copying the whole file #79243
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Do not override content root with default #79242
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Prevent warning for implicit ILCompiler reference #79240
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Outline exception throws in the interp and ifdef out unreachable opcodes #79239
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Add warning code to all warnings produced in WasmAppBuilder #79234
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.x
  • Don't use IlcPath in NativeAOT targets #79233
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • CallSiteRuntimeResolver. VisitFactory method implements adding IsInstanceOfType check #79232
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Use tokens for validation of Kept members in linker tests for NativeAOT #79228
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add tizen x64 cross build support #79226
    community-contribution
  • replace redhawk with nativeaot #79217
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove mono specific SpanHelpers #79215
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

Merged

  • Follow-up from NetCoreAppCurrent tfm update #79218
  • add SEC_E_CONTEXT_EXPIRED to avoid throwing InternalException #79129
    area-System.Net.Security, os-windows, 8.0.0
  • Speeds up linker tests in NativeAOT #79176
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Speed up data dehydration #79209
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Update generated typescript files #79222
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Update new ArgumentOutOfRangeException.Throw methods to include ActualValue #79157
    area-System.Runtime
  • Delete host test targeting old xunit packages #79177
    area-Host
  • Implement a heuristic for using fast-path serialization in streaming JsonSerializer methods. #78646
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • fix a typo #79230
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Enable package validation for libs introduced in .NET 7 #79221
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Speed up `Matrix4x4.CreateScale` #79172
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Small ConfigurationBinder Cleanup #79042
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Fix build error when enabling interpreter #78085
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Intrinsify Interlocked.CompareExchange and Interlocked.Exchange for null #79181
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • delete tfm constants #79219
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Handle local address nodes in `GenTree::Compare` #79202
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion and update NetCoreAppCurrent to net8.0 #78354
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono][tests] Using a literal field with stdsfld/ldsfld should trigger a MissingFieldException #79160
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Disable Allow_Connection_UnderDifferentUsers_ForClientReading on mono #79208
    area-System.IO
  • Remove char[] allocations from RegistryKey and List copy to Array #78737
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution

Updated

  • Documentation signature parser tests and fixes for NativeAOT #79168
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [JIT] Allow new temp assignment whose dstTyp is TYP_I_IMPL and valTyp is TYP_BYREF #79162
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • CoreCLR initialization failures logging #78790
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remaining feedback part1 #79011
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] - Fixed sub-optimal optimization for `a % 1` to Zero #77760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fold all local addresses in local morph #79194
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Put back setting of field in DirectorySearcher.FindAll #79192
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DirectoryServices, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Put back setting of field in DirectorySearcher.FindAll #79191
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DirectoryServices, 6.0.x
  • Add ProductVersionSuffix to workload manifest names #79184
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [draft][wasi] compile with libs.native #79046
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Implement unmanaged-to-managed direction for vtable stub generator #77130
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • fix SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated with cached credentials #79128
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add mechanism for runtime to query host for information #78798
    area-Host
  • Fix Runtime_76194 test #78760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixing assert on variable live range for simd12 LCL / STORE_LCL #79182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allocate static boxes on FOH #2 #79188
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove span pinning associated with string.Create #78914
  • Rewrite Enum and add {ISpanFormattable}.TryFormat #78580
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Additional Validation for PauseThresholdWriter and ResumeThresholdWriter #77359
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • Improve CI triggers to work better #79127
    area-Infrastructure
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add `InstructionEncoder.Switch`. #76526
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [Android] Fix SslStream on Android API 21-23 #78918
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • Cleanup unmaintainable parallel logic with workers #77993
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in the RegexCompiler and source gen #78927
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • More timeout checks in RegexOptions.NonBacktracking #74531
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Exclude things which broken on Loongarch #78850
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Supply `-s INITIAL_MEMORY` to emcc in wasm.proj #79148
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Use DOTNET_EnableCrashReport to create dumps #77578
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [draft][wasm] Memory snapshot #78915
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Convert Array icalls to use ObjectHandleOnStack. #77343
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add initial support for Freebsd.arm64 #71486
    arch-arm64, os-freebsd, area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Mono musl support #76500
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Trying to fix firefox flaky tests on CI. #75090
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix creating incorrect options in the repro package #79095
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Delete .NET Native leftovers from type loader (part 4 of X) #79138
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C Marshal: object tracker support #78280
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid dereferencing null if the debugger APIs are called before initializing the AppDomain #78970
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Broken parameters passing in dotnet CLI 7.0.* #29396
  • Multi-targeting with AOT dependency results in duplicate conflicting builds #29395
  • Unable to obtain lock file access on '/tmp/NuGetScratch/lock/...' since .NET 7 #29394
  • Analyzers being run inside VS but not when building on command line #29391

Closed

  • dotnet user-jwts create error: '/' is invalid after a value. Expected either ',', '}', or ']'. Path: $ | LineNumber: 9 | BytePositionInLine: 2. #29390
  • CI test failure: Microsoft.DotNet.Cli.New.IntegrationTests.CommonTemplatesTests.AllCommonItemsCreate #29259

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix for ClickOnce publish test failure #29399
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29397
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add net8.0 ILCompiler tests #29393
    Area-ILLink

Merged

  • Skip a couple of tests failing in CI #29383

Updated

  • dotnet nuget commands show correct help text #29266
    Area-CLI
  • dotnet tool install skip unlisted version #28951
  • Add base class for all test classes using WatchableApp. #29258
    Area-Infrastructure
  • extend typo correction functionality with StartsWith and Contains #29350
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Use the portable rid for --use-current-runtime (backports #21748) #27849
    Area-External, Servicing-approved
  • extract common logging functionality into ApiSymbolExtensions #29379
    Area-ApiCompat, Area-GenAPI
  • Pull razor dependencies from consolidate repo #29374
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #29341
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-05
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Syntax to choose CurrentCulture/InvariantCulture for interpolated strings #3044

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Collection literals #5354
    Working Set

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • API to determine if a syntax tree contains *conditional* directives. #65792
  • Update all global options to have no `feature` and a unique `name` #65787
    Backlog
  • Introducing inefficiency: It seems the Add Reference dialog box pops up from the Roslyn "red light bulb" ... seems superfluous for all occasions. #65778
  • Should we optimize foreach over an ImmutableArray? #65776
  • `:none` severity suffix behaves different than `:suggestion` #65774
  • Add documentation for IDE0241 #65766
  • Add documentation for IDE0240 #65765
  • Add documentation for IDE0230 #65764
  • Add documentation for IDE0210 #65761
  • Add documentation for IDE0130 #65759
  • Add documentation of IDE0120 #65758
  • Add missing documentation for new IDExxxx code style analyzers #65757

Closed

  • C# Text Editor - Switch/case lost collapse symbols #65784
  • Audit if new APIs added to IFileChangeWatcher.cs were intentionally public or not #65738
  • Add documentation for JSON and Regex related code style analyzer rules #65771
  • Add documentation for experimental formatting rules (IDE2000 - IDE2006) #65770
  • Add documentation for IDE0270 #65769
  • Add documentation for IDE0260 #65768
  • Add documentation for IDE0250 #65767
  • Add documentation for IDE0220 #65763
  • Add documentation for IDE0211 #65762
  • PublicAPI analyzer is not running #65707
    17.5
  • Add documentation for Regex and Json diagnostic analyzer (RE0001, JSON001, JSON002) #48530
    Backlog
  • Various diagnostics that reference parameters do not include the parameter name #62096
    Compiler.Next
  • Have a good way to track undocumented IDExxxx diagnostics #58876
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Add new API to easily tell if a node contains conditional preprocessor directives (without allocations). #65794
    Area-Compilers
  • WIP: Share syntax trees across linked files. #65793
    Area-IDE
  • Make main-vs-deps PRs non-draft #65791
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #65786
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Remove unused method #65785
    Area-IDE
  • Force arrow cursor for inline rename flayout #65783
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove unused methods #65782
    Area-IDE
  • Port "Incremental generator nodes must run when no result history" to 17.4 #65781
    Area-Compilers
  • WIP: Move off of uncached async lazys #65780
    Area-IDE
  • Emit `DecimalConstantAttribute` for synthesized delegates #65777
    Area-Compilers
  • Delete unneeded suppression for a fixed issue #65773
    Area-IDE, Community
  • draft #65772
    Area-IDE, Community

Merged

  • Fix correctness build #65789
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Unskip quick info tests #65725
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65736
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix bounds checking for `SyntaxTriviaListBuilder` indexer #65779
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Use RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan for array initialization with relevant primitives #61414
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add fixer to offer to use `nameof(parameter)` in attributes now that the language allows that. #65729
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Revert "Revert "Read required project properties from evaluation data"" #64892
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove "Top Level statement attribute" from language feature status #65743
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, Next
  • Fix potential race where we're expecting a moniker to be attached #65732
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Results of running new "use nameof for nullable attributes" analyzer/fixer on roslyn #65733
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge 'main' into 'PrimaryConstructors' #65755
    Area-Compilers
  • Add reviewers for "Primary Constructors" feature #65775
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Consider delegate default parameter values and `params` in symbol matcher #65579
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Display standalone parameter names by default #65606
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Rules missing documentation #62242
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, Next

Updated

  • Move to more consistent patterns in the parser. #65724
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement parsing changes for Primary Constructors feature #65720
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Move classification tests to new framework #65734
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure proper receiver value is used for a constrained call invocation #65642
    Area-Compilers
  • Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding #64928
    Area-Compilers
  • Stop referencing packages that became inbox on modern .NET. #65088
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • [LSP] Find refs - Remove bogus assert and add test #65675
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • log data for analyzers/codefixes/refactorings #65158
    Area-IDE
  • Implement a new brokered service for passing project information #65592
    Area-IDE
  • reduce the amount of time that we switch from a background thread to … #65641
    Area-IDE
  • Adding support for positional patterns to GenerateDeconstructMethodFixProvider.cs #65748
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove the feature flag and change the default for open generated files #60976
    Area-IDE
  • Allow multiline override #65395
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Avoid reporting ref safety errors for discard assignments #65693
    Area-Compilers
  • Move to using ToListAndFree in more places in the parser. #65708
    Area-Compilers
  • WIP: Always cache our lazy values. #65719
    Area-IDE
  • Cleanup `SyntaxNormalizerTests` #65516
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Create DkmCustomUIVisualizerInfo instances with ExtensionPartId field #65730
    Area-Interactive, Community
  • Revert "Disable flakey integration tests" #62542
    Area-IDE
  • Remove dotnet5 feed #65742
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Produce binding errors for incomplete members #62874
    Area-Compilers, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Output Caching Does not work if Authorization Header is Present #45469
  • I want to send a domain_hint from Blazor Web Assembly (using Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.MsalWebAssemblyServiceCollectionExtensions.AddMsalAuthentication ) #29440 #45468
  • Perf regression: mapaction #45465
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, mvc #45464
  • Angular/React .NET 6.0.404 project template.json ids match those in .NET 7 #45462
  • Report nullable warnings from netstandard2.0 targets when nullable is explicitly enabled #45455
  • ASP.Net Core 6.0.11 Identity Sticky session not working #45453

Closed

  • Add support for url pattern /v1/books/ext-{external_id} in grpc transcoding #45126
  • API's for creating custom WebSocket server's without dealing with transport code. Bedrock? #45214
  • Blazor Server Get Cookie before the first render #45435
  • Allow acr_values to be sent when client application sends code to authorization server using asp.net core OpenIdConnectHandler #45443
  • InputNumber validation not working as expected #45420
  • Perf improvement: plaintext_actix #45449
  • Blazor Custom Elements not rendering RenderFragment content in an angular app #38369
    Backlog
  • Blazor Webassembly standalone deployments #45428
  • Cannot have a property called "Model" ona class when model binding on postback #45240

PullRequests

Created

  • Regenerating src/SignalR/clients/ts/common/yarn.lock #45470
    area-signalr
  • Fix ControllerLinkGeneratorExtensions throw ArgumentException #43845 #45467
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Remove obsolete classes #45466
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Enable configuring the connection timeouts in HubConnectionBuilder #45463
    area-signalr
  • Fix endpoint Middlweware #45460
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Enable nullable reference types in analyzer projects #45454
    area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `e68764c` to `1f643f7` #45457
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Fix Http3ConnectionEmptyBenchmark #45406
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Bump decode-uri-component from 0.2.0 to 0.2.2 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/common #45438
    area-signalr, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 8.0-preview1
  • Bump decode-uri-component from 0.2.0 to 0.2.2 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/FunctionalTests #45437
    area-signalr, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 8.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `a70f5d3` to `b95684a` #45456
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Use built in methods #45426
    Perf, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `3026483` to `1f643f7` #45387
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `93f08be` to `1f643f7` #45388
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `eb74422` to `f6fabbb` #45389
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Update CODEOWNERS #45391
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `3026483` to `1f643f7` #45385
    area-infrastructure, 3.1.x
  • Code analyzer to detect if route parameters are parsable #45286
    area-infrastructure
  • Warn the user if they're specifying protocols that won't be used #45352
    area-runtime
  • [release/7.0] Endpoint filter pipeline now returns EmptyHttpResult in case of 400 BadRequest #45109
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime
  • [release/7.0] Add support for JSON output to more `user-jwts` commands #45431
    Servicing-consider, area-commandlinetools, area-web-frameworks
  • Bump SDK to 8.0.100-alpha.1.22602.10 #44925
    area-infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2060700 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • Get EmptyHttpResult in RDF via reflection #45354
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/7.0] Fix response code description in Minimal APIs #45244
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/7.0] Do not generate Content for request parameters in OpenAPI #45439
    Servicing-consider, area-web-frameworks
  • gRPC JSON transcoding: Resolve all descriptors from registry #45436
    area-grpc

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-05
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • DumpArray uses wrong method table when dumping arrays of structs #3532
    8.0.0
  • `dotnet-trace` on containers #3480
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Search for the diagnostics docker in the mount NS of the target process #3539
  • [Dotnet Monitor] Revert To Logging a single payload (not a list) #3538

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Xamarin.AndroidX.Work.Runtime support for .net7 #11887
  • [xamlc] Try to remove `[LoadInSeparateAppDomain]` #11885
    .NET 8 Planning
  • iOS publish Release not working after update to VS 17.4 #11882
  • .Net 7 Android Unfocused Entry Behavior only gets called when leaving the page #11881
  • [WinUI] If a container is present on a control the DesiredSize returned from the Handler isn't correct if the user has specified explicit Dimensions #11880
  • HorizontalOptions="FillAndExpand" is ignored in Android when a stack layout is inside a RefreshView #11879
  • Error rendering entry within a grid #11878
  • Removing the entire ContentPage.Resources element does not trigger the UI updates #11877
    Backlog
  • ImageButton with CornerRadius is not calculated as expected on Android when Padding exists #11874
  • [Net7] ScrollView/Grid/Label width calculation broken on .Net 7, no issue on .Net 6 #11873
  • Enable to access dll because it is being used by another process. #11872
  • [IPreferences] Make support types public #11871
  • MAUI program cannot be started in net7.0-android33.0 #11869
  • CollectionView cause Intent memory Leak #11866

    Backlog

Closed

    .NET 7 Planning

  • Grouped collectionview problem with performance #10700
    Backlog

    Backlog
  • [Android]First added entry get focus when unfocusing the second added entry dynamically in navigation page #10486

PullRequests

Created

    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • [net7.0] Possible fix for issue #10960 #11798
  • Add empty PointerOver states to Buttons to reduce confusion #11842
  • Reconcile PointerOver, Pressed, and Focused states #11840

  • [net7.0] Update templates to have separate default for framework selection #11843

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EF Core 7 AlterColumn generates an UPDATE in the SQL Server migration that can cause issues if the column is renamed in a subsequent migration #29780
  • dotnet ef migrations bundle fails with `error NETSDK1083: The specified RuntimeIdentifier 'amzn.2-x64' is not recognized` on some AWS Linux machines #29774
  • SQL Server - Table-Per-Hierarchy (TPH) - Creates multiple FKs to the same table #29770
  • .NET 7 - Internal CLR error (0x80131506) in dotnet ef cli #29769
  • Thoughts on a DbCommandInterceptor to skip empty queries #29768

Closed

  • 6.0.11 to 7.0.0: [...] are both mapped to column [..] but are configured to use differing provider types ('double' and 'double?').' #29531
    7.0.x
  • Json/Query: translate element access of a json array #28648
    8.0.0
  • Define DeleteBehavior from the child class. #29698
  • Does Json Column support a collection value? #29735
  • EF7 reverse engineering missing HasForeignKey vs. EF6 #29721
  • Add overload to ToListAsync with an initial capacity. #29720
  • Enable non-tracking for specific Entity #29719
  • Tpt mapping Sql Query #29687
  • Just upgrade from .net 6 to .net 7 and get an issue on "await app.RunAsync();" #29684
  • How to configure many to many to change the default configurations in EF Core 7.0 #29683
  • Unusual navigation names in generated models from existing database #14278
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Scaffolding: Handle FK on keyless entity type #29779
  • [release/7.0] Allow shared columns with nullable value converters #29778
    Servicing-consider
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlite3 from 2.1.2 to 2.1.3 #29777
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_winsqlite3 from 2.1.2 to 2.1.3 #29776
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_sqlite3 from 2.1.2 to 2.1.3 #29775
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Remove common property prefix navigation naming #29771

Merged

  • Allow shared columns with nullable value converters #29746
  • Fix to #28648 - Json/Query: translate element access of a json array #29656

Updated

  • Add support for Global Query Filters on derived types. #27978
    propose-close, waiting-for-response
  • Sequence cache support #29716

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-05
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Update the implicit versions to match the December release #15084
  • Use relative paths when referencing YAML templates #15086
